alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:55PM CDT until July 01 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CRAWFORD COUNTY... At 255 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cuba to near Steelville to near Courtois, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sullivan, Cuba, Steelville, Bourbon, Leasburg, Cherryville, St. Cloud, Dillard, and Davisville. This also includes Onondaga Cave State Park and Dillard Mill Historic Site. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 214 and 218. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
